languages.text:
This creature's armour depends on the amount of its wounds:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 30% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 20% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 10% armour.</indent>
Also reduces incoming damage from any damage type except Shock, Energy and Warp by 50%.

traits.locale_text:
This creature's armour depends on the amount of its wounds:
-<indent=5%>If it has more than 70% of its total wounds, it has 30% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has 70–40% of its total wounds, it has 20% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If it has less than 40% of its total wounds, it has only 10% armour.</indent>
Also reduces incoming damage from any damage type except Shock, Energy and Warp by 50%.

languages.text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on its number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>more than 70% wounds — 30% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} этого существа зависит от его запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}:
-<indent=5%>больше 70% здоровья — 30% брони</indent>
-<indent=5%>от 70 до 40% здоровья — 20% брони</indent>
-<indent=5%>меньше 40% здоровья — 10% брони</indent>
Также это существо получает на 50% меньше урона (за исключением энергетического, электрического и {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}).

Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage, except energy, shock, and warp damage.

Также это существо получает на 50% меньше урона (за исключением энергетического, электрического и {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}).

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} dieser Kreatur hängt von der Zahl ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} ab:
-<indent=5%>mehr als 70 % Wunden – 30 % Rüstung</indent>
-<indent=5%>70 bis 4 0% Wunden – 20 % Rüstung</indent>
-<indent=5%>weniger als 40 % Wunden – 10 % Rüstung</indent>
Außerdem erleidet diese Kreatur -50 % weniger Schaden (gilt nicht für Energie-, Schock- und {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}).
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on its number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:

-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text:
Die Rüstung dieser Kreatur hängt von der Zahl ihrer Wunden ab:
-<indent=5%>mehr als 70 % Wunden – 30 % Rüstung</indent>
-<indent=5%>70 bis 4 0% Wunden – 20 % Rüstung</indent>
-<indent=5%>weniger als 40 % Wunden – 10 % Rüstung</indent>
Außerdem erleidet diese Kreatur -50 % weniger Schaden (gilt nicht für Energie-, Schock- und Warp-Schaden).

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} de cette créature dépend de son nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} :
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures supérieure à 70 % : 30 % d'Armure</indent>
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures entre 70 et 40 % : 20 % d'Armure</indent>
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures inférieure à 40 % : 10 % d'Armure</indent>
De plus, elle subit 50 % de dégâts en moins (hors dégâts d'énergie, d'électrocution et {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}du Warp{/g}).
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on its number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>more than 70% wounds — 30% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text:
L'Armure de cette créature dépend de son nombre de blessures :
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures supérieure à 70 % : 30 % d'Armure</indent>
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures entre 70 et 40 % : 20 % d'Armure</indent>
-<indent=5%>réserve de blessures inférieure à 40 % : 10 % d'Armure</indent>
De plus, elle subit 50 % de dégâts en moins (hors dégâts d'énergie, d'électrocution et du Warp).

languages.text:
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}取决于当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}：
- <indent=5%>生命值高于70%——30%护甲</indent>
- <indent=5%>生命值在40%到70%之间——20%护甲</indent>
- </indent>生命值低于40%——10%护甲<indent=5%>
此外，此生物承受的伤害降低50%（能量伤害、电击伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}除外）。
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on its number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>more than 70% wounds — 30% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text:
此生物的护甲取决于当前生命值：
- <indent=5%>生命值高于70%——30%护甲</indent>
- <indent=5%>生命值在40%到70%之间——20%护甲</indent>
- </indent>生命值低于40%——10%护甲<indent=5%>
此外，此生物承受的伤害降低50%（能量伤害、电击伤害、亚空间伤害除外）。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de esta criatura depende de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}:
-<indent=5%>más del 70 % de heridas — 30 % de armadura</indent>
-<indent=5%>del 70 al 40 % de heridas — 20 % de armadura</indent>
-<indent=5%>menos del 40 % de heridas — 10 % de armadura</indent>
Además, esta criatura sufre −50 % de daño (no afecta al daño de energía, al de conmoción ni al {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}).
languages.original_text:
This creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} depends on its number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}:
-<indent=5%>more than 70% wounds — 30% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text:
La armadura de esta criatura depende de sus heridas:
-<indent=5%>más del 70 % de heridas — 30 % de armadura</indent>
-<indent=5%>del 70 al 40 % de heridas — 20 % de armadura</indent>
-<indent=5%>menos del 40 % de heridas — 10 % de armadura</indent>
Además, esta criatura sufre −50 % de daño (no afecta al daño de energía, al de conmoción ni al daño de disformidad).

languages.text:
この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の数によって以下のように異なる。
-<indent=5%>傷が70%を超える場合：30%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が70%～40%の場合：20%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が40%を下回る場合：10%アーマー</indent>
さらに、この生物が受けるダメージは-50%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}は対象外）。

-<indent=5%>more than 70% wounds — 30% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>from 70 to 40% wounds — 20% armour</indent>
-<indent=5%>less than 40% wounds — 10% armour</indent>
Additionally, this creature suffers −50% less damage (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text:
この生物のアーマーは、傷の数によって以下のように異なる。
-<indent=5%>傷が70%を超える場合：30%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が70%～40%の場合：20%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が40%を下回る場合：10%アーマー</indent>
さらに、この生物が受けるダメージは-50%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、ワープダメージは対象外）。

この生物のアーマーは、傷の数によって以下のように異なる。
-<indent=5%>傷が70%を超える場合：30%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が70%～40%の場合：20%アーマー</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が40%を下回る場合：10%アーマー</indent>
さらに、この生物が受けるダメージは-50%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、ワープダメージは対象外）。

languages.text:
Bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} miktarına bağlıdır:
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %70'ten fazlaysa — %30 zırh</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %70 ila %40 arasındaysa — %20 zırh</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %%40'tan azsa — %10 zırh</indent>
Ayrıca bu yaratık, %50 daha az hasara maruz kalır (enerji, şok ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarını{/g} etkilemez).
